Description: Group used to manage Intune and PAW CMS device configurations
Notes: Typical Role Owner: Specific Trusted Individuals (Used instead of Global Admin)

Description: Group used to define the scope of Customer-PAW-CSM-Intune-Admin Intune role
Notes: Scope group is not the primary option to limit the scope of an Intune admin role

Description: Group used to manage Intune and EUD device configurations
Notes: Typical Role Owner: Specific Trusted Individuals (Used instead of Global Admin)

Description: Group used to define the scope of Customer-EUD-Intune-Admin Intune role
Notes: Scope group is not the primary option to limit the scope of an Intune admin role
